stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

 

Compare how social movements have influenced government policies in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following.

(a) Define social movements.

(b) Describe two different examples of a social movement, each one within a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.

(c) Explain how the social movements have influenced government policies for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in part (b).
